channel.title: CHanging xp u get if you hit a monster?
channel.description:
how can i change the 4xp per hit to like 100 xp per hit on a monster or player?
thanks

item.title: CHanging xp u get if you hit a monster?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

look after stuff like this

double TotalExp = 0; TotalExp = (double)(500 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);

where 500 is. is the exp each hit

Read full topic
